title: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345 [Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps mentioned in 1GEWMOZ (ITPUI:WIN2000Scripted resource editor example opens on XML files by default): 
1. Create a new basic project. 
2. Create a new file named test.xml. 
3. The editor used is the scripted resource editor example, which ignores the XML file content. 
4. In the Navigator, select test.xml. 
5. Choose 'Open With...' / 'Default Text Editor'. 
6. Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example is reactivated. 

Searching for an existing open file should also consider the editor types. It should open a new editor on the file because the editor type is different.
